narrative.narrative: Indochina Airlines was a short lived Vietnamese domestic carrier that lasted from November 25,2008 until exactly a year later on November 25,2009. Its base was Ho Chi Minh City aka Saigon. From there it flew to Hanoi and Da Nang.It used two leased 737-800's. The airline was founded with the name Air Speed Up. Its founder Hu Hung Dung is a popular musician in Vietnam.
